title: League flashes black screen when in loading screen and in game
body: So yesterday league was working fine for me but I had a windows update and decided to do it over night. When i launched this morning I hoped right into a ranked game because I didn't expect anything to happen. I got through the champion select perfectly fine but when I got into the loading screen i would see if for a brief second then it would be replaced by black flashing bright and dark. I tried restarting my client but when I joined again the problem still continued. I tried restarting my computer but no fix. I then uninstalled and reinstalled league of legends but even that did not fix this problem. I don't know what to do. I have never had a problem like this in my life before so please help me out because I am totally lost for what to do. I use windows 10. I don't know what else to say. Please help!

replies.body:
This could be caused by a number of potential issues. The Windows 10 Anniversary update that went out recently and enabled some Xbox Game DVR settings by default. Since this is a fairly simple change, I recommend disabling these features real quick to see if it happens to fix your problem. [Here's a guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) on how to do this.

If you still have issues, please let me know.
